flawed_nl_solution:
Silas paid half = 150/2 = <<150/2=75>>75
Remaining bill paid by 5 friends = 75 + 10% of 150 = 75 + 15 = 95
Each person will pay 1/5 which is 95/5 = <<95/5=19>>19
Each friend will pay $19=<<19=19>>19.
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 95. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
